pages.text: The $(thing)Abyss$() is full of hostile creatures waiting to dine on your flesh. Let's take a look!
pages.title: Mobs

pages.text: These ominous, flying eyeballs can be seen in the skies. They can shoot powerful explosives at players, so keep an eye out for them! (No pun intended.)
These ghostly shadow mobs roam the land. They can inflict a Wither effect on hit

These giant arthropods suck the blood of their victims in order to rejuvenate themselves. They also inject a venom that inflicts Slowness, making it harder for their targets to escape after that first hit

$(thing)Distorters$() are immobile and donâ€™t deal damage. Instead, they have the ability to give either Speed or Slowness effects to players in the surrounding area, switching regularly between the two
$(thing)Fiends$() are common mobs that can inflict Blindness when hitting their targets
$(thing)Flesh Eaters$() are undead creatures that reside in Flesh Temples. They inflict a dangerous Hunger effect on hit, which can easily empty the hunger bar before it expires
These mobs live in Jawe Huts. Thereâ€™s nothing unique about their attacks, but they can drop Bloodstones and some other items
$(thing)Occulents$() are common melee attackers. Sometimes, they can create doubles of themselves. Fortunately, these doubles are illusory, so they will not deal any damage and cannot block attacks
These towering sorcerers carry around a wand that can shoot powerful projectiles. Nightmare Flakes can make them grow even larger
